mapper.insert: insert into instance(page, size, create_time) values(#{page, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime, jdbcType=DATETIME})
mapper.sql: update instance set page=#{page, jdbcType=INTEGER}, size=#{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time=#{createTime,jdbcType=DATETIME} where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: delete from instance where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from instance limit (#{page, jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1) * #{page, jdbcType=INTEGER}), #{size, jdbcType=INTEGER}
